articles.description: Manchester United return to Premier League action on Thursday night when they travel to Brighton and Hove Albion
articles.content:
Manchester United are still battling with a number of injuries ahead of Thursday night's trip to Brighton and Hove Albion in the Premier League.

articles.title: Supreme Court asks its former judge Justice L Nageswara Rao to finalise draft constitution of All India Football Federation - Bar & Bench - Indian Legal News
articles.description: The Supreme Court on Tuesday entrusted former apex court judge, Justice L Nageswara Rao with the task of finalising the draft constitution of the All India
articles.content: The Supreme Court on Tuesday entrusted former apex court judge, Justice L Nageswara Rao with the task of finalising the draft constitution of the All India Football Federation (AIFF).
